addr: 1 Alie Street. Aldgate. London E18DE GB
title: INDOOR CYCLING: THE MISSED OPPORTUNITY - London
desc: In the fitness industry, the only thing that remains constant is change. Preferred exercise spaces are shifting - despite their high cost, Small boutique gyms with a single activity are now the second most popular venue. People? are moving away from typical? multi-purpose fitness centres, which are losing market share quickly,? to micro-gyms.?? ? AC NIELSEN 2013 How can you utilise your club spaces to compete with these venues, increase your current participation, grow membership and retain current members? Maximise your group cycle space! The average club cycle studio sits dormant for upwards of 80% of the day. Does yours? If so, we have something you might be interested in! ? Join us and broaden your Cycle opportunity. This workshop and networking opportunity will hi ghlight some of the latest cycle research, insight, and best practices to improve your current Cycle offering. The Insight Session will be followed by an exclusive preview of the new Les Mills SPRINT? class. Bring you workout kit and be the one of the first in the world to try this revolutionary 30 minute workout.
